svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 16, 2024" date: "2024-11-16"
Devconnect in 2025 & Devcon in 2026, Justin Drakeâ€™s beam chain proposal and Virgil
* FastEthereumCrawler : node discovery v5 (discv5) crawler based on Nim implementation
* Justin Drake: beam chain proposal [video], upgrade consensus layer with a batch of
features in ~2029 for faster slots, faster finality, SNARKs & quantum security
Justin Drake: beam chain proposal [video], upgrade consensus layer with a batch of
* Anders Elowsson: consolidation incentives in Orbit single slot finality
Anders Elowsson: consolidation incentives in Orbit single slot finality
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.23.0 : Mekong testnet support & fix for CPU illegal
* Lodestar v1.23.0 : Mekong testnet support & fix for CPU illegal instruction
* Lisk (former alt-L1) migrated to OP Stack
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7814 : Introspection precompiles
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7815 : Swap order routing interface ERC7816 : Schnorr
signature scheme for EVM Applications ERC7817 : Dapp security policy ERC7818 :
* ERC7816 : Schnorr signature scheme for EVM Applications
ERC7816 : Schnorr signature scheme for EVM Applications
* OpenZeppelin community contracts (Solidity): experimental contracts, co-developed
OpenZeppelin community contracts (Solidity): experimental contracts, co-developed
* Coinbase smart wallet spend permissions : request to spend native & ERC20 tokens for
Coinbase smart wallet spend permissions : request to spend native & ERC20 tokens for
* CTFs: OpenZeppelin Ethernaut new levels: impersonator & magic animal carousel
Secureum RACE #34 : answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
* OpenZeppelin Ethernaut new levels: impersonator & magic animal carousel
OpenZeppelin Ethernaut new levels: impersonator & magic animal carousel
* Secureum RACE #34 : answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
* 0xPARC Provable Object Datatype (POD): used in Zupass, FrogCrypto & Meerkat
0xPARC Provable Object Datatype (POD): used in Zupass, FrogCrypto & Meerkat
* DeltaPrime $4.8M exploit on Arbitrum & alt L1, attacker then staked stolen funds
DeltaPrime $4.8M exploit on Arbitrum & alt L1, attacker then staked stolen funds
* Red Guild: Phishing Dojo , interactive quiz on identifying phishing attacks
Red Guild: Phishing Dojo , interactive quiz on identifying phishing attacks
* Devconnect next up in 2025 & Devcon in 2026, suggest a location
Devconnect next up in 2025 & Devcon in 2026, suggest a location
* Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Verge , the Purge & the
Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Verge , the Purge & the
* Nethermind: Auditor , Agent Engineer , Content Marketing Manager & Researcher
Nethermind: Auditor , Agent Engineer , Content Marketing Manager & Researcher
* Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 4.4 to 131.5 gwei, 24.5 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.3 gwei 0.3k ETH net burn this week
* Gas: 4.4 to 131.5 gwei, 24.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 4.4 to 131.5 gwei, 24.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
* ERC4337 shared user operations pool live on mainnet, Arbitrum & OP mainnet
ERC4337 shared user operations pool live on mainnet, Arbitrum & OP mainnet
* Vitalik: info finance category , includes prediction & decision markets
Vitalik: info finance category , includes prediction & decision markets
* SEC sued by 18 states for regulatory overreach in crypto
SEC sued by 18 states for regulatory overreach in crypto
* US Attorney's Office SDNY devoting fewer resources to harass crypto
US Attorney's Office SDNY devoting fewer resources to harass crypto
* ETH ETF net positive lifetime inflows
ETH ETF net positive lifetime inflows
* Virgil Griffith coming home in April
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
